resources.string: Help us improve our products and services.

The elaboration about this questionnaire is completely anonymous. The collected information will be only used for statistical purposes and formative purposes. In any moment the collected information will be used or provided to third parties. If you have any question, you can contact with us sending an email to our account info@diariotrassierra.com".
How long have you been using Diario de Trassierra products and services?
about six months and one year
How did you discover Diario de Trassierra web?
Will you enter in Diario de Trassierra web again?
¿Wich device do you usuallly use to see our electronic services?
Would you be willing to hire a premium digital subscription?
No, I will not buy it.
Yes, I can mensually pay between 5 euros and 10 euros
Yes, I can mensually pay more than 10 euros mensually
What do you think about our paper subscription service?
I don\'t use it, it is an obsolete medium that is doomed to disappear
I don\'t use it, but several people close to me continue to use this format
I use it on specific occasions
I always use it and for me is much better than the electronic way
Please, tell us your overall satisfaction with the Diario de Trassierra web
Do you recomend Diario de Trassierra services to your family and friends?
Home screen of the app it contains the app logo. We can press the start button to go to the next screen.
Screen to introduce our personal data. Contains age, genre and province. We must enter our data before continue. When data is introduced we can go to the next screen pressing continue button.
Screen with the questionnaire, made-up by 8 questions that we need to answer by selecting the response to continue, if we press on next it will change to the next question.

The number 4 question is La pregunta número 4 is multiple choice. As we go further the questions, you can see down a bar that shows us the progress. In the questionnaire final you have a continue button to go to the result screen.
Screen that show us questionnaire result and your personal data. We can finish the app pressing finish button or go back Home Screen by pressing back button
If we press about option in the menu of the app it will show the app data like name, creator, creation year.
